item.title: Nvidia stock has been in something of a rut. One analyst says the price could double.
item.description: Analyst says Wall Street is underestimating future data-center revenue for chip giant

item.title: My friend and her husband own property. How do her kids get their fair share?
item.description: “They are joint tenants with the right of survivorship.”

item.title: Star Island mansion once owned by Rosie O’Donnell sells for $36 million after huge price drop
item.description: Rosie O’Donnell’s former Miami home has sold for a staggering $36 million to the billionaire founder of Rockstar Energy Drink.

item.title: N.Y. townhouse of late Ivana Trump gets another price cut: It’s now listed for $17.9 million
item.description: The late Ivana Trump’s residence has taken yet another price decrease, with it now listed for $17.9 million—a staggering $8.6 million difference from ...

item.title: Crunch time for Argentina as local elections this weekend represent referendum on Milei
item.description: A lot is riding on Sunday’s provincial elections: markets need reassurance of continuity in Milei’s reform agenda.
